name: Bard (eggohito)
description:
As a bard, you can play any [note block] instrument. Playing certain note patterns can give you various results, like activating a power for example. 

In order to play a note, you'd have to press either the primary, or secondary key once. 

To cycle through the instruments, you can press the 9th hotbar. 

To switch octaves, you can press the 8th hotbar. 

To change the key signature, you can press the secondary ability key. 

To change scale, you can press the primary ability key.
